SEARCH
Package AcademicExchangePlatform.service

Class CourseService

java.lang.Object
AcademicExchangePlatform.service.CourseService
public class CourseService extends Object
Service class for managing course operations. Handles business logic for course creation, updates, and search functionality. Implements the Singleton pattern and manages course-related notifications.
